title: מוזיאון תל אביב לאמנות - יום כניסה חופשית (Tel Aviv Museum of Art - Free Entry Day)
location: Tel Aviv Museum of Art, Shaul HaMelech Blvd 27
description: Free entry to Tel Aviv Museum of Art every Tuesday. Permanent and temporary exhibitions.

title: מוזיאון ישראל - שעות כניסה חינם (Israel Museum - Free Entry Hours)
description: Free entry to Israel Museum on Saturday mornings. Archaeology, art, and Judaica collections.

title: מוזיאון חיפה לאמנות - תערוכה חדשה (Haifa Museum of Art - New Exhibition)
location: Haifa Museum of Art, HaTzionut Blvd
description: Contemporary Israeli art exhibition. Free entry Sunday-Thursday.

title: הרצאות חינם באוניברסיטת תל אביב (Free Lectures at Tel Aviv University)
description: Open lecture series on science, technology, and society. Free admission.

title: TEDx Beer Sheva - Free Public Event
description: Free TEDx talks at Ben Gurion University. Innovation, technology, and social change.

title: הרצאה חינם: היסטוריה של ירושלים (Free Lecture: History of Jerusalem)
description: Fascinating lecture on Jerusalem's history from ancient times to today. Free with registration.

title: יוגה חינם בפארק הירקון (Free Yoga in Yarkon Park)
location: Yarkon Park, Gan Yehoshua, Tel Aviv
description: Free community yoga class in Yarkon Park. All levels welcome, no registration needed.

title: Free Sunrise Yoga - Haifa Beach
description: Free sunrise yoga session on Dado Beach. Bring your own mat. All levels welcome.

title: יוגה בפארק אשכול - באר שבע (Yoga in Eshkol Park - Beer Sheva)
description: Free community yoga in Eshkol Park. Suitable for beginners and advanced practitioners.

title: פילאטיס חינם בגן סאקר (Free Pilates in Sacher Park)
description: Free pilates class in Sacher Park. Bring a mat, free admission.

title: סיור אמנות רחוב חינם בפלורנטין (Free Street Art Tour in Florentin)
description: Free guided tour of street art and graffiti in Florentin neighborhood.

title: פסטיבל אמנות רחוב - נמל יפו (Street Art Festival - Jaffa Port)
description: Free street art festival. Local artists, live music, creative workshops.

title: גלריה פתוחה - מושבת האמנים עין הוד (Open Gallery - Ein Hod Artists Village)
description: Free self-guided tour of artist galleries in Ein Hod village.

title: סיור לילי חינם בעיר העתיקה (Free Night Tour in the Old City)
description: Free guided night tour in the Jewish Quarter of the Old City.

title: Free Walking Tour - Haifa German Colony
description: Free guided walking tour of Haifa's historic German Colony. English and Hebrew.

title: סיור היסטורי חינם בעיר העתיקה באר שבע (Free Historic Tour - Beer Sheva Old City)
description: Free guided tour of Beer Sheva's Old City. History, architecture, and culture.

title: שוק אוכל חינם - נמל תל אביב (Free Food Market - Tel Aviv Port)
description: Free tastings from top chefs at Tel Aviv Port. Free entry for the whole family.

title: Free Friday Concert at the First Station
description: Free live music concert every Friday at the First Station complex.

title: פסטיבל תרבות חינם - כיכר רבין (Free Culture Festival - Rabin Square)
description: Free culture festival with live music, street theater, and art performances.

title: שוק פשפשים קהילתי - ראשון לציון (Community Flea Market - Rishon LeZion)
description: Community flea market and free gardening workshops at Nahal Park.

title: פעילות משפחות חינם - פארק הנחל (Free Family Activity - Nahal Park)
description: Free family activities: kids entertainment, creative workshops, and street performances.
